actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Criminal Justice.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide death benefits for any person employed by a correctional institution or facility who dies as the result of personal injury sustained while performing official duties.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide death benefits for any person employed by a correctional institution or facility who dies as the result of personal injury sustained while performing official duties.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to provide death benefits for any person employed by a correctional institution or facility who dies as the result of personal injury sustained while performing official duties.
